title: OpenAI Platform Docs
description: Developer documentation for the OpenAI Platform. Covers text generation, agents, function calling, fine-tuning, and the full API reference. Each doc page has a markdown twin.

title: Vercel Documentation
description: Vercel is the AI Cloud â€” a unified platform for building, deploying, and scaling AI-powered applications and agentic workloads. Comprehensive docs on deployments, domains, functions, and more.

title: Next.js
description: The React Framework for the Web. Full-stack web applications with React Components. Includes versioned documentation for Next.js 14, 15, and 16 with LLM-optimized markdown access.

title: Supabase Docs
description: Open-source Firebase alternative with Postgres database, Auth, Edge Functions, Realtime, and Storage. SDK references for JavaScript, Dart, Swift, Kotlin, Python, and C#.

title: Stripe Documentation
description: Complete Stripe payment platform documentation. Covers payments, billing, Connect, terminal, webhooks, and the full API reference. Every doc available as .md endpoints.

title: Cloudflare Developer Documentation
description: Build and deploy full-stack applications everywhere with integrated compute, storage, and networking. Covers Workers, Pages, R2, D1, AI, and the Agents SDK.

title: Clerk
description: The most comprehensive User Management Platform. Embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards for authentication. Includes AI authentication solutions and agent identity.

title: Astro
description: All-in-one web framework using island architecture and server-first design. Provides abridged, complete, and topic-specific documentation sets optimized for LLM consumption.

title: Convex Documentation
description: Reactive database with TypeScript queries, mutations, and actions. Full-stack backend with real-time sync, file storage, scheduled functions, and auth integration.

title: Resend
description: Email API for developers. Modern email sending and receiving platform for transactional and marketing emails. Includes SDKs for Node.js, Python, PHP, Ruby, Go, Java, Elixir, Rust, and .NET.

title: Model Context Protocol
description: Open standard for connecting AI agents to tools and data sources. Specification, SDKs, example clients, and community governance for the MCP ecosystem.

title: Netlify Documentation
description: Web platform for building highly performant, secure, and reliable websites. Covers Edge Functions, serverless functions, build configuration, deploy previews, and more.

title: Deno Documentation
description: Open source JavaScript, TypeScript, and WebAssembly runtime with secure defaults. Covers the Deno CLI, Deno Deploy cloud service, and related tools.
